Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • ActorWorld
      • Game

  • public class Game
extends ActorWorld
    A Game Class that extends ActorWorld. It acts as the main game controller, and manages the GUIController and Grid.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int HEIGHT 
      static java.lang.String LEVEL_PATH 
      static int NUM_LEVELS 
      static java.lang.String SAVE_PATH 
      static java.lang.String SCORE_PATH 
      static int WIDTH 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game()
      Constructs a new Game, which is an ActorWorld, and loads the first level.
      Game(java.lang.String n)
      Constructs a new Game with a given name.

      Displays the html help document.

      Updates the health bar at the top of the screen and checks to see if health drops to 0.

      Complete the game and display high scores.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game()
        Constructs a new Game, which is an ActorWorld, and loads the first level.

      • Game

        public Game(java.lang.String n)
        Constructs a new Game with a given name. Used when loading save files.
        Parameters:
        n - the name of the user.

    • Method Detail

      • step

        public void step()
        Called at an interval to advance the game one frame. Based on GUIController Timer. Calls the act method for every Actor still in the grid, checks to see if a level is complete, and updates the in game time

      • checkComplete

        public void checkComplete()
        Method to check whether a level is complete. If it is complete, sets complete to true.

      • save

        public void save()
        Creates a new text file in the save folder with the name of the player as the title. This saves the current level, health, time, key location, door state, and the position of all Actors. Uses format that will allow it to be loaded by loadLevel()

      • loadLevel

        public void loadLevel(java.lang.String fileName)
        Loads the given level from a file using the given file name.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the path of the file to be loaded.

      • updateHealth

        public void updateHealth()
        Updates the health bar at the top of the screen and checks to see if health drops to 0.

      • keyPressed

        public boolean keyPressed(java.lang.String description,
                          Location loc)
        Method to handle keyboard input controlling the main character
        Parameters:
        description - pf key pressed based on KeyStroke class
        loc - the active Location when the key was pressed(not used)
        Returns:
        whether a key was used

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Executes and views a Pause Menu

      • showHelp

        public void showHelp()
        Displays the html help document.

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove(Location loc,
                       int direction)
        Method to determine whether link can move one space from the given location in the given direction
        Parameters:
        loc - the current Location
        direction - the direction(see Location class constants)
        Returns:
        whether the move is valid

      • canAttack

        public boolean canAttack(Location loc,
                         int direction)
        Method to determine whether link can attack one space from the given location in the given direction
        Parameters:
        loc - the current Location
        direction - the direction(see Location class constants)
        Returns:
        whether the attack is valid

      • gameOver

        public void gameOver()
        Game over.

      • playAgain

        public void playAgain()
        Prompts the user to play again or exit.

      • win

        public void win()
        Complete the game and display high scores.
